Class: Dimension

insight. Dimension

new insight.Dimension(name, crossfilterData, sliceFunction, oneToMany)

A Dimension organizes a dataset along a particular property, or variation of a property. Defining a dimension with a function of:
function(d){ return d.Surname; }
will slice a dataset by the distinct values of the Surname property.
Name Type Description
name String The short name used to identify this dimension, and any linked dimensions sharing the same name
crossfilterData crossfilter The crossfilter object to create the Dimension on.
sliceFunction function The function used to categorize points within the dimension.
oneToMany boolean Whether or not this dimension represents a collection of possible values in each item.
TODO
  • reimplement how Dimensions are created. Too much is inside ChartGroup at the moment, and ChartGroup is becoming redundant and too mixed
  • display function should be provided by a setter.

Methods

staticinsight.Dimension.this.createFilterFunction(filteredValue){function}

Local helper function that creates a filter object given an element that has been clicked on a Chart or Table. The filter object creates the function used by crossfilter to remove or add objects to an aggregation after a filter event. It also includes a simple name variable to use for lookups.
Name Type Description
filteredValue object The value to create a crossfilter filter function for.
Returns:
A function that a crossfilterdimension.filter() operation can use to map-reduce crossfilter aggregations.
